news_header: Summer workers are being sought for various jobs, with different selection methods used by employers, including a lottery system in Nurmijärvi.
news_original_title: Osa työnantajista valitsee kesätyöntekijät valtavirrasta poiketen – paikan voi saada myös ilman cv:tä tai arpaonnella
news_text: The search for summer jobs peaks from January to March, with many employers seeking suitable candidates. The municipality of Nurmijärvi has adopted a lottery system for selecting young summer workers, which aims to provide equal opportunities, especially since young applicants often lack extensive CVs. Other employers, like the telecommunications company DNA, also recruit without traditional CVs, focusing instead on knowledge and motivation. Despite some innovative approaches, many employers still prefer traditional recruitment methods. The overall summer job market appears slightly better this year compared to last, with an increase in job postings.
